BackstoryDef.title: pit slave
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spends every waking hour toiling on a mining installation, accompanying a raid, or being thrown into brutal bloodsports.

BackstoryDef.title: slave soldier
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a dedicated combat slave, shipped to destination in cryosleep and woken by an injection of performance enhancing stimulants as they make their descent planetside.

BackstoryDef.title: slave enforcer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is primarily employed in the management of other slaves either planetside or in space. They are occasionally brought on raids, particularly when collection tribals and outlanders to add to the fleet's workforce.

BackstoryDef.title: laboratory slave
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is used as a guinea pig in medical experiments, as a source of hemogen, and otherwise finds themself under the cold knife of the mechanoid servitors of the dreadfleet on a regular basis.

BackstoryDef.title: courtesean
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spends their days as a sycophant and courtesean in a wealthier spacer's court.

BackstoryDef.title: sharpfingers
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has established a reputation as a crackshot, and makes a living accompanying raids and competing in bloodsports

BackstoryDef.title: concubine
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken as a concubine by a powerful liche. They spent all their time by their master's side, whether raiding, partying, or at home.

BackstoryDef.title: speed demon
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has put an unusually large number of stimulants through their system, even by dreadfleet standards. They've achieved an equilibrium where they can function in this state but struggle to manage slaves or avoid getting caught up in dangerous plans.

BackstoryDef.title: little gray man
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is just another working stiff in the dreadfleet; chilling, killing, making ends meet.

BackstoryDef.title: mechanitor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] operates a large group of mechs spaceside.

BackstoryDef.title: narcissist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is known to have a harem composed entirely of their own clones.

BackstoryDef.title: raid leader
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] never misses a chance to raid planetside. They've made their fortune in captured slaves and recovered archotech.

BackstoryDef.title: slaver
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] manages a slaving operations, and is personally responsible for breaking the leaders of countless tribes and towns to be integrated into the workforce of the fleet.

BackstoryDef.title: artiste
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] operates a design studio. They are keenly active in the metropolitan culture of the dreadfleet, which has led to a huge amount of training for and participation in a variety of bloodsports.
